actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-790.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 6291 to amend the Emergency Agricultural Credit Adjustment Act of 1978 and the Commodity Credit Corporation Charter Act to extend and increase certain agricultural loan programs, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 6291 (Agricultural loan programs).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 6291 to amend the Emergency Agricultural Credit Adjustment Act of 1978 and the Commodity Credit Corporation Charter Act to extend and increase certain agricultural loan programs, and for other purposes.
